featured.text: My mom is on the line.
And then we began getting a lot of questions: What did Mom put in the cereal?
Mom and Dad are coming here for a weekend next month.
Mom seldom asked Dad to go shopping in the traditional market for her.

other.text: Unfortunately, the items were usually different from Mom’s 35 .
What does Zeke Emanuel have in mind when saying “What did Mom put in the cereal?” (A)

definition.zh_def: 母親，女性家長或照顧者。
definition.example: My mom makes the best cookies.
